name: myllm-chat
description: MyLLM Chat - AI Chat Application with Desktop Support

scripts.dev:electron: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=client" "npm run dev --workspace=server" "npm run dev --workspace=electron"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=client && npm run build --workspace=server
scripts.build:electron: npm run build && npm run build --workspace=electron
scripts.electron:dev: npm run build:electron && npm run start --workspace=electron
scripts.electron:dist: npm run build:electron && npm run dist --workspace=electron
scripts.electron:dist:win: npm run build:electron && npm run dist:win --workspace=electron
scripts.electron:dist:mac: npm run build:electron && npm run dist:mac --workspace=electron
scripts.electron:dist:linux: npm run build:electron && npm run dist:linux --workspace=electron
scripts.electron:pack: npm run build:electron && npm run pack --workspace=electron
scripts.release:build:all: npm run build:electron && npm run dist --workspace=electron
scripts.release:build:win: npm run build:electron && npm run dist:win --workspace=electron
scripts.release:build:mac: npm run build:electron && npm run dist:mac --workspace=electron
scripts.release:clean: rimraf electron/release electron/dist electron/app client/dist server/dist
scripts.release:test: npm run build && echo 'Build test successful - ready for release'
